nodes.text: Serissu was a female Bothan who worked as a pilot trainer for the Car'das.

Serissu was a well-trained pilot for the Car'das. After the Battle of Yavin, she was based on Tansarii Point Station, in the Bright Jewel system, along with Laetin A'shera, Aleas Rans'ery and Dartas Pytin. Serissu served as pilot recruiter and trainer.

Circa 1 ABY, Serissu recruited several spacers to become pilots for Car'das. She provided them M3-A Scyk fighters and taught them basic starfighter piloting skills. The new pilots performed successful missions, including a patrol near Station Gamma, a dogfight against Black Sun pirates around an abandoned space hulk, and an escort of a Car'das officer. The new pilots were finally assigned to fight in the Battle of Tansarii Point Station under the orders of Laetin A'shera.

Serissu was a NPC in the tutorial of Star Wars Galaxies prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Serrisu gave the player an M3-A Scyk fighter to use during the piloting tutorials. She gave players the first quests involving space flight, including basic things as piloting, docking, contacting space stations, fighting enemy ships and escorting friendly ships. After completing her missions, players could talk to Laetin A'shera to get more difficult space missions.
